Surround yourself with other passionate professionals who can offer advice, support, and ideas.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][deeper_text text_align="align-left" text_margin_bottom="25px" text_font_size="20px" text_letter_spacing="-0.2"]Office essentials[/deeper_text][vc_column_text]

You’ve got all the basics covered, from bookable conference rooms to high-speed WiFi, printing services, and even A/V equipment.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column][deeper_spacer desktop="70" mobile="50" smobile="50"][deeper_portfoliocarousel portfolio_style="style-2" items="20" cat_slug="group-4" gap="30" fullaside="true" groupcell="true" class="dots-style-2" show_bullets="yes" bullets_offset="bullet-offset-60" style="style-2" bullets_style="bullet-style-1"][/deeper_portfoliocarousel][deeper_spacer mobile="80" smobile="80"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-md-8"][deeper_fancyimage image="767" effect="reveal" video_style="style-3" video_url="url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DvtNIpM-NDBM%26t%3D2s|||" class="reveal-radius-50"][deeper_spacer desktop="" mobile="" smobile="50"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-md-4"][deeper_contentbox padding="18% 0 0 35px" translatex="0" translatey="0"][deeper_text text_align="align-left" text_margin_bottom="40px" text_font_size="28PX" text_letter_spacing="-0.2"]Work wherever you want in our coworking areas[/deeper_text][vc_column_text]

We exist to help modern, ambitious business work where, when and how they want. We’re proud to provide workspace solutions to some of the world’s leading companies.

[/deeper_pricebox][deeper_spacer desktop="" mobile="30" smobile="30"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" el_class="hover-effect-1 z-index-9999" offset="vc_col-md-4"][deeper_pricebox align="align-center" plan_name="Private Office" plan_name_color="#1d2b36" plan_desc="Guaranteed desk in a shared workspace with 24hr access for the day you pick!" price="$900" price_text_color="#1d2b36" price_pre_color="#1d2b36" price_suf_color="#1d2b36" url_showcase="button" button_align="align-center" button_size="small" button_text="Purchase Now" button_url="url:https%3A%2F%2Fninzio.com%2Fworksquare%2Fcontact|||" plan_name_letter_spacing="0" animation="yes" animation_effect="fadeInRight" animation_delay="0.5s"]
  • Unlimited Widgets
  • Unlimited Feedback Forms
  • Ticketing System Included
[/deeper_pricebox][/vc_column][vc_column][deeper_contentbox translatex="0" translatey="0" class="hide-on-mobile"][deeper_parallaxbox][deeper_parallaxitem image="887" left="-11%" top="-49%" class="z-index-low" parallax_y="-40"][/deeper_parallaxbox][/deeper_contentbox][deeper_spacer desktop="110" mobile="80" smobile="80"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height="yes" canvas="%5B%7B%22shape%22%3A%22shape-1%22%2C%22image_effect%22%3A%22style-1%22%2C%22smoothness%22%3A%2230%22%7D%5D"][vc_column][deeper_text text_align="align-left" text_font_size="28px" text_letter_spacing="-0.2"]Frequently asked questions[/deeper_text][deeper_spacer desktop="80"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][deeper_text text_align="align-left" text_tag="h3" text_font_size="20px" text_letter_spacing="-0.2"]Let's backup a step. What is coworking?[/deeper_text][deeper_spacer desktop="" mobile="" smobile="25"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Coworking is a exchange or collaboration between self-employed people or people working for different employers by working out of an open space. "Working together" in a coworking community can mean anything from working on your own business or project in a shared space to simply exchanging an idea in the hallwa

[/vc_column_text][deeper_spacer desktop="50" mobile="50" smobile="50"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][deeper_text text_align="align-left" text_tag="h3" text_font_size="20px" text_letter_spacing="-0.2"]What is the difference between desk and permanent desk?[/deeper_text][deeper_spacer desktop="" mobile="" smobile="25"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

A hotdesk member has use of all the same facilities and services as a permanent member, with the exception that you do not have an assigned desk and must take possessions with you when you leave the workspace for the day. If you’re not fussed about having the same spot every time, a hotdesk membership is perfect for you.

[/vc_column_text][deeper_spacer desktop="50" mobile="50" smobile="50"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][deeper_text text_align="align-left" text_tag="h3" text_font_size="20px" text_letter_spacing="-0.2"]Is coworking or a serviced office right for me?[/deeper_text][deeper_spacer desktop="" mobile="" smobile="25"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

If you have a business that requires privacy, such as a psychologist, then coworking’s probably not for you. If you’re not as fussed about the social aspect and need a quiet place to meet clients – then a serviced office might be ideal.

[/vc_column_text][deeper_spacer desktop="50" mobile="50" smobile="50"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][deeper_text text_align="align-left" text_tag="h3" text_font_size="20px" text_letter_spacing="-0.2"]Do I need to have rental insurance?[/deeper_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Rental insurance is not a requirement but we do recommend it for members of Private Offices or Dedicated Desks.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column][deeper_spacer desktop="120" mobile="80" smobile="80"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" bg_custom="row-1800" bg_color="#e4f5fd" bg_rounded="50px" canvas="%5B%7B%22shape%22%3A%22shape-1%22%2C%22image_effect%22%3A%22style-1%22%2C%22smoothness%22%3A%2230%22%7D%5D"][vc_column][deeper_spacer desktop="490" mobile="490" smobile="490"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" canvas="%5B%7B%22shape%22%3A%22shape-1%22%2C%22image_effect%22%3A%22style-1%22%2C%22smoothness%22%3A%2230%22%7D%5D" el_class="overflow-visible custom-pd-1 row-mg-1"][vc_column][deeper_text text_color="#074883" text_margin_bottom="16px" text_tag="h5" text_font_weight="600" text_font_size="16px" text_letter_spacing="-0.2" text_font_family="Open Sans"]Testimonials and reviews from our customers[/deeper_text][deeper_text text_font_size="28px" text_letter_spacing="-0.2"]What our customers are saying about us[/deeper_text][deeper_spacer desktop="70" mobile="50" smobile="50"][deeper_carouselbox gap="30" groupcell="true" class="dots-style-2" show_bullets="yes" bullets_offset="bullet-offset-60"][deeper_testimonialbox avatar="388" avatar_width="70px" avatar_rounded="50%" author_name="Stella Smith" image_rating_width="120px" title_font_weight="" comment_font_weight="" author_name_font_weight="" author_position_font_weight="" class="no-rating"]“We got 300% grown result from being at a coworking space compared to working from home/coffee shops. You can pay with a credit card or via net banking (if you’re in USA). We will renew your subscription automatically at the end of every billing cycle.

[/vc_column_text][deeper_spacer desktop="50" mobile="50" smobile="50"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][deeper_text text_align="align-left" text_tag="h3" text_font_size="20px" text_letter_spacing="-0.2"]What is a licensed user and how it works?[/deeper_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

When upgrading your team to the Premium plan, you purchase and assign licenses to all active users (team members who've used Workspaces at least once in the past 30 days).

[/vc_column_text][deeper_spacer desktop="50" mobile="50" smobile="50"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][deeper_text text_align="align-left" text_tag="h3" text_font_size="20px" text_letter_spacing="-0.2"]Can I cancel my plan subscription at any time?[/deeper_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Yes, you can cancel your Premium plan subscription at any time. But, we’ll be sad to see you go!

Use our powerful suite of business collaboration tools - Shared To-Dos, Polls, Note Sharing, Reminders and more.[/deeper_text][deeper_button button_style="custom" button_size="big" button_text="Sign Up" button_url="url:https%3A%2F%2Fninzio.com%2Fworksquare%2Fservices|||" button_text_color="#ffffff" button_background="#ffa200" button_border_width="2px" button_border="#ffa200" button_text_hover="#ffffff" button_background_hover="#28bd36" button_border_hover="#28bd36" button_font_weight="" animation="yes" animation_delay="0.9s"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][deeper_contentbox margin="-8% -41% 0 -41%" translatex="0" translatey="0" class="ipad-no-margin"][deeper_parallaxitem image="1231" class="hide-on-mobile"][/deeper_contentbox][/vc_column][vc_column][deeper_spacer desktop="140" mobile="100" smobile="100"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row canvas="%5B%7B%22shape%22%3A%22shape-1%22%2C%22image_effect%22%3A%22style-1%22%2C%22smoothness%22%3A%2230%22%7D%5D"][vc_column][deeper_spacer desktop="120" mobile="100" smobile="100"][deeper_text text_margin_bottom="20px" text_tag="h6" text_font_weight="600" text_font_size="16px" text_letter_spacing="-0.1" text_font_family="Open Sans"]Manage the team everyone wants to be on[/deeper_text][deeper_text text_width="850px" text_font_size="32px" text_line_height="40px" text_letter_spacing="-0.3"]Sign up and become one of the millions of people around the world using Workspaces to get more done.[/deeper_text][deeper_spacer desktop="70" mobile="50" smobile="50"][deeper_subscribe style="style-1" alignment="align-center" width="470px" animation="yes"][deeper_text text_color="#999999" text_width="850px" text_tag="div" text_font_size="14px" text_letter_spacing="0.01" animation="yes"]Get the app for Windows PC, Mac, Linux, Chrome[/deeper_text][deeper_spacer desktop="120" mobile="100" smobile="100"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

text_margin_bottom="40px" text_font_size="28PX" text_letter_spacing="-0.2"]Serviced offices and coworking space to rent in San Francisco and NY[/deeper_text][deeper_text text_color="#556575" item.title: Communicate business core competencies
item.dc:creator: worksquare@admin
item.content:encoded:
In an era of stand-up desks and walking meetings, not being stuck in one seat all day is becoming the norm.

In an era of stand-up desks and walking meetings, not being stuck in one seat all day is becoming the norm. Most people spend the majority of their day sitting at work, but too much sitting in the same position is detrimental to your health and well-being. To encourage employees to get up and move around the office.

Most people spend the majority of their day sitting at work, but too much sitting in the same position is detrimental to your health and well-being.

Rooftop hangout and thinking chairs

Not only do employees at Workspaces, South Korea, get to enjoy an outdoor space during the workday, they also have the option to literally hang out in oversize hanging chairs. The vibrant colors and tufted cushions beckon anyone in need of a screen break.

“Often, offices are designed to reflect the culture of the city or region where they’re located. As soon as you see this space in Tokyo, you’ll recognize the seiza-style mats that are traditionally used in Japan to kneel on.”
There’s more than comfort riding on this design shift. Research shows that today’s workforce is more productive when there’s flexibility and autonomy in choosing where they can sit and get their work done. According to the Gensler 2019 U.S. Workplace Survey, 79 percent of employees in workplaces with a variety of settings reported having a great work experience.

item.title: Here are the 5 most telling signs management
item.dc:creator: worksquare@admin
item.content:encoded:
In an era of stand-up desks and walking meetings, not being stuck in one seat all day is becoming the norm.

In an era of stand-up desks and walking meetings, not being stuck in one seat all day is becoming the norm. Most people spend the majority of their day sitting at work, but too much sitting in the same position is detrimental to your health and well-being. To encourage employees to get up and move around the office.

Most people spend the majority of their day sitting at work, but too much sitting in the same position is detrimental to your health and well-being.

Rooftop hangout and thinking chairs

Not only do employees at Workspaces, South Korea, get to enjoy an outdoor space during the workday, they also have the option to literally hang out in oversize hanging chairs. The vibrant colors and tufted cushions beckon anyone in need of a screen break.

“Often, offices are designed to reflect the culture of the city or region where they’re located. As soon as you see this space in Tokyo, you’ll recognize the seiza-style mats that are traditionally used in Japan to kneel on.”
There’s more than comfort riding on this design shift. Research shows that today’s workforce is more productive when there’s flexibility and autonomy in choosing where they can sit and get their work done. According to the Gensler 2019 U.S. Workplace Survey, 79 percent of employees in workplaces with a variety of settings reported having a great work experience.Many important brands have given us their trust

Consulting with an innovator in the construction sector means working with a team who know what they want. Our client is a renowned brand with a clear vision and high expectations from the designers they partner with.

With our in-house design and manufacturing team we were able to value engineer the project to meet expectations and budget.

item.title: Minimalist Pen
item.dc:creator: worksquare@admin
item.content:encoded: The desk is open on the right side enabling him to work unobtrusively with his assistants. By placing as many tools as possible on the left wall panel a layout that allowed him to reach for his tools easily and comfortably, with his left hand- his dominant hand, was achieved. The “adjustable shelf system”, as used in stores, was employed. Grooves were cut vertically at 85mm intervals on the partition walls. Shelves and equipment of varying sizes can be mounted on the grooves, making it possible for Mr. Matsui to freely configure, to his liking, items like glasses, pens, cups, and books.
item.excerpt:encoded: A desk produced at the request of Yusei Matsui, a renowned Japanese cartoonist who authored “Assassination Classroom” as well as other publications.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Consulting with an innovator in the construction sector means working with a team who know what they want. Our client is a renowned brand with a clear vision and high expectations from the designers they partner with.

With our in-house design and manufacturing team we were able to value engineer the project to meet expectations and budget.

[/vc_column_text][deeper_spacer desktop="40" mobile="30" smobile="30"][vc_column_text]
